articles.title: FTSE 100 slides again after week of market turmoil - The Telegraph
articles.description: The FTSE 100 has dropped again, rounding off a tumultuous week for global markets amid fears of interest rate rises and the looming threat of war in Europe.
articles.content:
Good morning.
Britain and the EU are said to be preparing sanctions on new Russian gas projects in retaliation for any attack on Ukraine.

articles.author: David M. Herszenhorn, Giorgio Leali
articles.title: In call with Macron, Putin slams West for ignoring Russia’s ‘fundamental concerns’ - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The French president had planned to offer ‘path’ to de-escalation.
articles.content:
Russian President Vladimir Putin used a phone call with French President Emmanuel Macron on Friday to accuse the U.S. and NATO of ignoring Russia’s “fundamental concerns” over NATO’s growth.

articles.author: Joseph Henry
articles.title: iOS 15.4 to Add EU Digital COVID-19 Vaccination Records in Health, Wallet Apps - Tech Times
articles.description: European users can now add their COVID vaccination certificates in Apple Wallet and Health apps as part of the iOS 15.4 update.
articles.content: Apple will be adding a new feature for the iOS 15.4 beta for European users. According to the Cupertino giant, the COVID-19 vaccination certificates can now be added to the Wallet and Health applicat… [+3824 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Australia has offered to export more liquefied natural gas to Europe in light of Ukraine tensions. Here's why - ABC News
articles.description: Australia offers to provide liquefied natural gas to "friends and allies" in Europe, should Moscow decide to cut off energy supplies in light of Ukraine tensions.
articles.content: Australia has offered to provide additional liquefied natural gas (LNG) to "friends and allies" in Europe, should Moscow decide to cut off energy supplies to European countries heavily reliant on gas… [+7971 chars]
